author: damonc
msg: Renamed tcl_commands.c to rivetCore.c
Renamed tcl_commands.h to rivet.h
This change is mostly to start putting files in a standard format as well
as make room for new libraries in the future.  It's basically the standard
tcl naming scheme of tcl<function group>.c

author: damonc
msg: Adding some new commands to the Tcl directory.
debug - A very handy command for printing debugging information.
html  - A Tcl re-write of the NWS html command for printing text in HTML.
incr0 - Increment a variable.  If it doesn't exist, create it.
wrap  - Take a string and wrap it at X characters.
read_file - Read the contents of a file and return it.

author: damonc
msg: * src/mod_rivet.h
Added RIVET_NEW_CONF macro to create a new rivet_server_conf.
* src/mod_rivet.c
Added Rivet_MergeDirConfig to merge directory configurations.
Fixed bug where RivetDirConf was giving erroneous information.

author: damonc
msg: * tests/
Removed access.conf
Removed srm.conf
Added mime.types
* tests/makeconf.tcl
Went ahead and copied over the entire rivet directory.
* tests/rivet.test
Changed the default port to 8081.
* tests/template.conf.tcl
Changed the default port to 8081.
Removed access.conf and srm.conf.

author: davidw
msg: * tests/makeconf.tcl (makeconf): Added a command to copy over the
init.tcl file to the testing directory.  It would probably be best
to copy the whole directory, though.
